name: Magnet Technologies
overview:
Magnet Technologies is a software application development company with specialist skills in rich internet applications, iPhone development, open source technologies and localization.

Magnet is a 10 year young software development company based in India. They have a strong team of 100+ highly skilled professionals spread across two development centres. Magnet has clients in USA, Australia and Europe and are looking to explore other emerging markets.

Magnet’s core expertise is in the following technologies:

  • Rich Internet Applications (RIA) using Flash/Flex/AJAX
  • iPhone Application Development
  • Web Application Development using PHP/.Net
  • Local Language Solutions
  • Linux Deployments & Hosting Services
  • Design & User Interface

Magnet has been featured as one of the Red Herring Top 20 Open Source Companies.

Magnet has worked on business intelligence applications, online commerce, document management systems, video sharing sites, training sites etc.
